item.description:
It's January, it's cold outside (and probably snowing), so what better place to be than snuggling in front of a fire with a glass of ice wine?  Join us for an exploration of ice wines and other late harvest style wines. 

Due to the higher prices of these unique wines, cost of the evening will likely be in the $20-25/person range.

There will be a fire (but no snuggling) and Chef Noel feels like trying some wine-dessert pairings.  Have dinner before hand and come for dessert!

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: Fireside Chat about Ice Wines
